jsock.net

Class ObjectSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsock.net.JSocket
      • jsock.net.MessageSocket
        • jsock.net.ObjectSocket

  • public class ObjectSocket
extends MessageSocket
    Created by czifro on 1/16/15. ObjectSocket is designed to read/write structured data on the stream.
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    William Czifro
